bibl.title: Texts from the Early Islamic Period of Egypt. Muslims and Christians at their First Encounter. Arabic Papyri from the Erzherzog Rainer Collection, Austrian National Library, Vienna. (Nilus.15.)
bibl.note: + xiii pp. en arabe, nombr. figg. coul.

Selection of 21 documents, including 3 bilingual papyri, Arabic-Greek. - No. 1 = C.P.R. III, 37. Protocol, 709 C.E. - Nos 4 (P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 39726; A.P. 8) and 5 (P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 39751; A.P. 531). Tax-payment in kind, 643 C.E.; and Entagion, 709 C.E. [ed.: Adolf GROHMANN, From the World of Arabic Papyri (Cairo, 1952) pp. 113-115; 131-132].
